name: CNN
text: "If the President of the United States knew that Covid-19 was worse than people thought -- and worse than he was letting on by comparing it to the seasonal flu -- why didn't HE go tell the American public about it?" writes @CillizzaCNN https://t.co/9EK0TANY3C

name: CNN
text: Would you take a coronavirus vaccine as soon as it’s released? Or do you have concerns? Tweet #CNNTownHall with the… https://t.co/mqmnoXkya0

name: CNN
text:
President Trump was asked directly on Thursday why he lied to the American people about the coronavirus pandemic.

The beginning of Trump's response: "I didn't lie."

That itself is a lie. https://t.co/YLR0ZfGk95

name: CNN
text: "Imagine you were an alien who landed on planet Earth. …You would scratch your head and think this is just not a planet that has much promise for the future," @NIHDirector Dr. Francis Collins says about some Americans' refusal to wear masks. #CNNTownHall https://t.co/Z14xGKqEux https://t.co/yZq2HstiBh

name: CNN
text: President Trump, subdued but sharply defensive, insisted he hadn't lied to the American public about the severity of coronavirus even though he told a journalist on tape he was downplaying it to avoid panic https://t.co/cso11paYPJ

name: CNN
text: Dr. Francis Collins, director of the National Institutes of Health, wants Americans to wait for science to determine the efficacy of a Covid-19 vaccine and not let "crazy conspiracy theories" influence them. #CNNTownHall https://t.co/9LYT4TlgVi

name: CNN
text: Dr. Francis Collins, director of the National Institutes of Health, reiterated that it's "very unlikely" a coronavirus vaccine will be made available by Election Day. #CNNTownHall https://t.co/AnwzHI5UrZ

name: CNN
text: Terrance Bannister, the cousin of Demetria “Demi” Bannister, a teacher who died after contracting Covid-19, called his late family member "a soldier" who will be greatly missed. #CNNTownHall https://t.co/bzcdmlfXgS

name: CNN
text: The Wisconsin Supreme Court told election officials in the state on Thursday — a week before the deadline to mail ballots — that they can't mail out absentee ballots until the court decides whether to add the Green Party's presidential ticket to the ballot https://t.co/mEKSbozKja

name: CNN
text:
"Demetria was a soldier for us... She was free-spirited, she always kept the family together," says Terrance Bannister of his cousin, a 28-year-old teacher who died from Covid-19.

"She just did a lot for us, and we're going to miss her." #CNNTownHall https://t.co/AANwPyaTTw https://t.co/ikXIqmiDv1

text: “It’s completely irresponsible for President Trump to have downplayed the impact of the coronavirus at a moment when every second, every minute, every day, every week counted...
